That's not an accurate definition at all. Science was in fact created, in order to better understand the world that God created for us. I am a scientist, and computer programmer. I do not completely ignore facts, nor evidence, and saying that we do, is wrong. I know some people say that we should ignore science. I disagree. Since God is an orderly God, we can see this order in creation. If you accept intelligent design, then you must accept an intelligent designer.
